title: Grab the TicWatch Pro 5 for up to 20% LESS with this Deal!
description: Mobvoi's premium smartwatch is on sale at the moment. The post Grab the TicWatch Pro 5 for up to 20% LESS with this Deal! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Mobvoi's premium smartwatch is on sale at the moment.
text: If you’re looking for a capable Wear OS smartwatch, the TicWatch Pro 5 is one of the more versatile wearables out there, especially when compared to competing devices from mainstream brands. It does come with some impressive features which makes it a nice alternative for users after looking for a reasonably-priced and feature-packed Wear OS device. In terms of features, the TicWatch Pro 5 comes with a nice list of hardware, which includes a 1.43-inch AMOLED touchscreen covered with Gorilla Glass, Snapdragon W5+ Gen 1 Wearable Platform, as well as a generally-sturdy design. For software it ships with Wear OS 3, which works with 2GB of RAM and 32GB of internal storage, with access to a ton of different apps from Google and third party developers. Other features include an Accelerometer, Gyro Sensor, Heart Rate Sensor, SpO2 Sensor, Skin Temperature Sensor, Low Latency Off-Body Sensor, a Barometer, and a Compass. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart. html:
If you’re looking for a capable Wear OS smartwatch, the TicWatch Pro 5 is one of the more versatile wearables out there, especially when compared to competing devices from mainstream brands. It does come with some impressive features which makes it a nice alternative for users after looking for a reasonably-priced and feature-packed Wear OS device.

In terms of features, the TicWatch Pro 5 comes with a nice list of hardware, which includes a 1.43-inch AMOLED touchscreen covered with Gorilla Glass, Snapdragon W5+ Gen 1 Wearable Platform, as well as a generally-sturdy design. For software it ships with Wear OS 3, which works with 2GB of RAM and 32GB of internal storage, with access to a ton of different apps from Google and third party developers.

Other features include an Accelerometer, Gyro Sensor, Heart Rate Sensor, SpO2 Sensor, Skin Temperature Sensor, Low Latency Off-Body Sensor, a Barometer, and a Compass. You can check it out using the link below.
